title: School Library Self-Evaluation and Integrated Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of school library operations, experience with educational policy and self-assessment tools
context.additional_context: Learners use their own devices (BYOD) to combine online modules with face-to-face workshops, enhancing case-sharing and reflective practice competencies based on school library evaluation experiences

learning_goals: Systematically diagnose the current operational status of a school library and derive improvement directions
Possess the ability to design library integration into school development plans by applying the "Improve Your Library" self-assessment process
Share evaluation results with peer institutions and establish collaborative networks and reflective practice strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
